metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8762 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ajax_mediadiff function in DokuWiki before 2014-05-05a allows remoteattackers to access arbitrary images via a crafted namespace in the nsparameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8762` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20140505.a+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20140505.a+dfsg-1').
